Title: OpenSLP: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in OpenSLP, the worst of
    which could result in the arbitrary execution of code.

Background.Text: OpenSLP is an open-source implementation of Service Location Protocol (SLP).

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in OpenSLP. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text:
Gentoo has discontinued support for OpenSLP. We recommend that users
      unmerge OpenSLP:
P.P:
NOTE: The Gentoo developer(s) maintaining OpenSLP have discontinued
        support at this time. It may be possible that a new Gentoo developer
        will update OpenSLP at a later date. No known alternatives to OpenSLP
        are in the tree at this time.
